Title: Saw
Overview: Obsessed with teaching his victims the value of life, a deranged, sadistic serial killer abducts the morally wayward. Once captured, they must face impossible choices in a horrific game of survival. The victims must fight to win their lives back, or die trying...
Tagline: Live or die. Make your choice.
production_companies: Lions Gate Films, Twisted Pictures, Evolution Entertainment, Saw Productions Inc.
Cast: Cary Elwes, Danny Glover, Monica Potter
clean_text: see obsess teach victim value life derange sadistic serial killer abducts morally wayward capture face impossible choice horrific game survival victim fight win life die try live die choice horror mystery crime james wan cary elwe danny glover monica potter 2004
